With this place I wish Yelp had 6 starts for special occasions like this. They made our day! We got here tired right after travel, hungry and a little irritated with heat and crowds. The guy at the cashier took care of us like my mom would. He offered us a beer right away and when we couldn't decide what we want to eat he just suggested two pastas. He also gave us empanada to try as a starter. Everything in fluent english, I didn't even have to unrust my spanish. We sat down, relaxed a bit, got to check our email with their wifi. And then the food arrived. AWESOME pastas, homemade, flavourful, fresh, light yet filling. I am not sure if we were this hungry or if it was so heavenly good. We will go again today just to make sure about that :D Anyways, in our 2 week trip through Paris and Lyon we haven't have a meal so good. Thank you Tucco Real Food!!!!
